scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation Of Micro Food Processing Enterprises
description: The Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME) scheme aims to formalize micro food processing units by providing financial, technical, and marketing support. It enhances the competitiveness of micro enterprises in the food processing sector.
key_features: Financial support for micro food processing units

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 10 Lakhs with 35% credit-linked subsidy
benefits.training: Free training for food processing techniques

business_criteria: Must be a micro food processing enterprise
Must be registered or willing to formalize
operational_criteria: Engaged in food processing activities like dairy, fruits, vegetables, or grains
Must have a viable business plan

eligible_activities: Setting up or upgrading micro food processing units
Branding, packaging, and marketing of food products

steps: Visit the PMFME portal or Ministry of Food Processing Industries website
Register and submit an online application with a business plan
Upload required documents, including Aadhaar and business details
Applications are reviewed by the State Nodal Agency
Approved applicants receive funding and support
application_process.note: Applicants must complete formalization process to receive benefits

special_notes: The subsidy is linked to bank loans
Units must comply with food safety and quality standards
Priority is given to women, SC/ST, and rural enterprises
